title: Ticket #4006: auto-increase RequestMemory if ResidentSetSize>RequestMemory
description: We have jobs whose memory usage exceeds their RequestMemory specification and which consequently get stuck in a run-evict-run cycle. Since Condor has all the information necessary to update RequestMemory when it's clearly too low, it should do so.
remarks:
2015-Sep-22 15:37:09 by gthain:
Note that with cgroups, the job will go on hold, and the user or admin can then release it.

2015-Sep-22 15:37:48 by tpdownes:
TPD believes HTCondor staff time better spent steering people toward use of cgroups.
creator: pfc
